name: 12factorapplication
0:
”Alexa, ask Cloud Helper to tell me the twelve factors?”
”Alexa, ask Cloud Helper what is the third factor?”
”Alexa, ask Cloud Helper to tell me more about the disposability factor”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud helper
des: Ever had an argument with your fellow IT workers about how should you handle logs? Or if a stateful application is a good idea or not? Or about the necessity of continuous integration? Well, next time just ask Cloud Helper to explain them one (or all) of the twelve factors.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
